title: IITRAM Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Institute of Infrastructure Technology Research and Management (IITRAM) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the IITRAM Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the ...
